thyrburn.short: Spend Thyr for a temporary boost.
thyrburn.long: Main Action. Spend 1 Crystal to gain +2 dice, +3" Move, OR +2 Quality for the round.

fallout.long: Resolution. Roll 2d6 at end of round after Thyrburn. Affects device/models/terrain.

ritual.long: Main Action. Mystic only. Must be in Sacred/Tainted/Haunted ground. Resolves listed effect.

backlash.long: Passive. 0 Successes on Thyr ability = 1 damage or Taint surrounding terrain within 3".

haunted_engine.long: Passive. Using Thyrburn or Ritual places a Haunt within 3". Haunt acts at end of round.

crystal_feed.long: Passive. May carry +1 Thyr Crystal. Dropped on death.

sacrificial_overload.short: Burn the device to avoid Fallout.
sacrificial_overload.long: Once Per Game. Ignore Fallout; Device is Destroyed and area within 3" becomes Hazardous.

purge_thyr.long: Main Action. Remove all crystals and 1 Thyr-based trait within 6".

unleashed_power.long: Main Action. Ranged magical attack using Wild Magic. Roll on Wild Magic Table (2d6) to determine effect. May cause Strain.

strain.long: Passive. Using Unleashed Power causes 1 Strain. At 3 Strain, this unit may not use Unleashed Power until Strain is cleared (end of round or special ability).

thyr_boiler.long: Main Action. Once per game: Spend 1 Thyr crystal to gain +4" Move OR +2 Quality OR ignore terrain penalties this activation.
